titles.title: Expressing support of the designation of September 2022 as Peripheral Artery Disease Awareness Month.
Expressing support of the designation of September 2022 as Peripheral Artery Disease Awareness Month.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary: This resolution supports Peripheral Artery Disease Awareness Month and encourages the public to observe the month with appropriate awareness and educational activities.
